description: This document defines the requirements for GradeTime and is intended to enable a selected development partner to provide a non-binding cost estimate for development, testing, and delivery (assuming design is largely complete), propose a high-level development schedule and timeline, nominate an indicative project start date, and identify assumptions, dependencies, risks, and exclusions, and it should be read alongside the Lovable prototype as the source of truth for UX and feature intent; GradeTime is a web-based AI grading and analytics platform used exclusively by teachers and school staff (no student or parent logins) that automates marking and feedback for Extended Response, Short Answer, and Multiple Choice assessments, reduces teacher marking time, provides rubric-aligned editable AI scores and feedback, aggregates results into student, class, and school analytics, supports school-level oversight via an admin dashboard, integrates with Google Classroom, Canvas, and Turnitin, and uses OCR and AI document ingestion for PDFs, DOCX, JPG, and PNG including scanned handwriting; the teacher experience includes a dashboard with class and assignment navigation, class overview pages with metrics and exports, comprehensive rubric management (upload with OCR and AI parsing, stock rubrics, AI rubric creation, editable personal libraries with lifecycle controls), assignment creation and AI marking flows for all three task types with teacher-in-the-loop review, score adjustment, feedback editing, regeneration, plagiarism similarity scoring, and analytics mapping, detailed marking review via class and individual results screens with inline annotations and CSV/PDF exports, extensive student and class analytics with trends, strengths, weaknesses, misconceptions, AI-generated summaries, and report exports, per-teacher settings covering account details, class and roster management, syllabus uploads, grading defaults, and AI feedback style-guide training from prior marked work, and a full admin dashboard for user, class, integration, billing, analytics, compliance, logging, and error management; technically, the platform must align with ST4S and Australian legal requirements (Privacy Act 1988, APPs, NDB), enforce strict data privacy and minimisation, tenant isolation, encryption, Australian data residency, secure authentication and SSO readiness, auditing, logging, backups, incident response, configurable retention, explainable and governed AI usage with provider-agnostic abstraction, asynchronous AI and OCR processing, modular multi-tenant architecture with a single public API, LMS and plagiarism integrations, defined performance, scalability, and availability targets from MVP to full scale, and robust non-functional requirements covering security, reliability, and compliance.

tasks.description: Set up project structure and tools
Ensure responsive design for all devices
Manage app features depending on the user's role
Route users based on notification type
Handle receiving and sending push notifications
Adjust criterion scores and overall score
Generate AI score and feedback for short answer
highlight strengths and weaknesses in the text
View basic statistics and key information
Configure and setup google Turnitin API
Configure and setup google Classroom API
Secure handling of audio, transcripts, health data
Secure local watch storage for sensitive data
Log every action performed by staff members for transparency
Maintain detailed logs for data access and data manipulation
View a complete history of activities in the system

epics.name: AI Grading and Feedback Automation
epics.description: Automate grading and provide feedback using AI algorithms.

tasks.description: Integrate AI model for grading assessments
Develop feedback generation mechanism based on AI scores
Implement user interface for displaying AI-generated feedback

epics.name: Analytics Mapping - Admin
epics.description: Provide comprehensive analytics mapping for student, class, and school performance.

tasks.description: Design data models for analytics collection
Implement analytics dashboard for visualizing data
Create reports for class and school performance metrics

epics.name: OCR Document Ingestion
epics.description: Implement OCR capabilities for document ingestion.

tasks.description: Integrate OCR library for text extraction
Develop user interface for uploading documents
Implement validation and error handling for document uploads

epics.name: Plagiarism Similarity Scoring
epics.description: Implement plagiarism detection and similarity scoring.

tasks.description: Develop UI for displaying similarity scores and reports
Implement user notifications for plagiarism results

epics.name: Assignment Creation - Teacher
epics.description: Facilitate the creation and management of assignments.

tasks.description: Build assignment creation interface with rubric selection
Implement backend logic for saving assignments
Enable assignment editing and deletion functionalities

epics.name: Detailed Marking Review - Teacher
epics.description: Provide tools for teachers to review and adjust marks.

tasks.description: Create interface for reviewing student submissions
Implement score adjustment features for teachers
Allow inline annotations on student submissions

epics.name: Feedback Editing - Teacher
epics.description: Allow teachers to edit feedback provided to students.

tasks.description: Develop interface for editing feedback on submissions
Implement saving and updating feedback functionality
Create notification system for feedback updates

epics.name: Report Exports - Admin
epics.description: Enable exporting of reports in various formats.

tasks.description: Implement CSV export functionality for analytics data
Develop PDF export capabilities for reports
Create user interface for selecting export options

epics.name: Class Overview Pages - Admin
epics.description: Provide comprehensive overview pages for classes.

tasks.description: Design class overview UI with key metrics
Implement backend logic to fetch class data
Enable filtering and sorting options for class data

epics.name: Compliance Management - Admin
epics.description: Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

tasks.description: Implement data privacy policies and procedures
Create audit logs for compliance tracking
Implement billing system integration with payment gateways
Create invoice generation and management features
Develop reporting tools for billing analytics

epics.name: Asynchronous AI Processing
epics.description: Implement asynchronous processing for AI tasks.

tasks.description: Develop queuing system for AI task processing
Implement background processing for AI model training
Create notification system for task completion

epics.name: Data Privacy and Minimization
epics.description: Ensure data privacy and minimize data collection.

tasks.description: Create user data access and deletion features
Develop compliance reporting tools for data privacy

epics.name: Tenant Isolation
epics.description: Implement tenant isolation for multi-tenant architecture.

tasks.description: Design database schema for tenant isolation
Implement access controls for tenant data
Create tenant management interface for admins

epics.name: Audit and Logging
epics.description: Implement auditing and logging for system activities.

tasks.description: Develop logging framework for capturing events
Create audit trails for user actions
Implement reporting tools for logs and audits
